QuestData.Title: Blow it Up!
QuestData.Description: This is probably as under-control as this situation is going to get. Let's do this, $n.$B$BI need someone to light the fuse on those bombs and it looks like you're the one to do it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the nearby Saronite Bomb Stack to light the fuse.
QuestData.RewardText: These bombs look pretty potent. They should at least put a dent in the surrounding structure.
